SENTENCE.STRING: (Urdu: ِیصل آباد ) is located in Punjab, Pakistan.
is the third largest city in Pakistan with an estimated 2006 population of 2.6 million (
The entire district had a population of about 5.4 million in 1998.
is an important industrial centre located in the Punjab province, west of Lahore.

The city-district of Faisalabad is bound on the north by the districts of Gujranwala and Sheikhupura, on the east by Sahiwal district, on the south by Toba Tek Singh district and on the west by Jhang district.
